title: HUMINT
description: Honda, who lived that day while erasing his traces, meets a mysterious transvestite man, Himemiya. Himemiya makes Honda work at a rain fog security company. The face behind the rain fog guard is a spy who sneaks into the truth of a person and reveals the truth. It was human intelligence. A honey trap battle action full of laughter and sadness presented by Matsuri of "Bakemono no Yoru Tsuzukushi"!

altTitles.ja: HUMINT: Tale of  the Human Intelligence
